metadata.title: CVE-2024-42076 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:net: can: j1939: Initialize unused data in j1939_send_one()syzbot reported kernel-infoleak in raw_recvmsg() [1]. j1939_send_one()creates full frame including unused data, but it doesn't initializeit. This causes the kernel-infoleak issue.
